books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Four American trauma doctors face difficult choices when they join a mass-casualty training program in Paris.
books.name: TURNING POINT

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: Jessica Farris’s life unravels when she signs up for Dr. Shields’s psychology study.
books.name: AN ANONYMOUS GIRL

books.author: by James Lee Burke
books.description: Detective Dave Robicheaux and his new partner Bailey Ribbons investigate the death of a young woman by crucifixion.
books.name: THE NEW IBERIA BLUES

books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: The latest book in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series. Ahmare tries to save her brother while Duran finds temporary freedom.
books.name: PRISONER OF NIGHT

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Jayne Ann Krentz
books.description: The third book in the Cutler, Sutter and Salinas series. Quinton Zane returns to dispose of Anson Salinas’s foster sons.
books.name: UNTOUCHABLE

books.author: by Josh Malerman
books.description: Malorie must get her two young children 20 miles downriver to escape an unseen terror.
books.name: BIRD BOX

books.author: by Brad Taylor
books.description: Pike Logan takes on dangers involving North Korea, Syria and a substance called Red Mercury.
books.name: DAUGHTER OF WAR

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Three stories: “The House Next Door” (written with Susan DiLallo), “The Killer’s Wife” (written with Max DiLallo) and “We. Are. Not. Alone” (written with Tim Arnold).
books.name: THE HOUSE NEXT DOOR

books.author: by David Weber
books.description: The 10th book in the Safehold series. A temporary peace gives way as international alliances change.
books.name: THROUGH FIERY TRIALS

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: The fourth book in the Sullivan’s Crossing series. Two women in the Culver family are confronted with opportunities for love in Colorado.
books.name: THE BEST OF US

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A dog sets out across 400 miles of wilderness to find the man who rescued her as a puppy.
books.name: A DOG'S WAY HOME

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: Agents Pendergast and Coldmoon track a killer who removes hearts and leaves handwritten letters.
books.name: VERSES FOR THE DEAD
